Be always ready to hashtag#UnlockYourEdge!Last week @Reckitt the whole Marketing Team had the opportunity to join a 3-day workshop on Data-Driven Marketing, as a final step of a learning journey that started almost a year ago! Through its MX Academy, Reckitt launched a DDM upskilling programme, in partnership with BCG, to give every marketeer the credentials to move within the digital marketing space and truly unlock their competitive edge! The whole program retraced all the stages of a digital campaign (hashtag#planning, hashtag#activation, hashtag#analysis, hashtag#testandlearn) and honed in on audience-centric comms, digital activation journeys, optimizing & measuring digital campaigns - with the final aim to allow the deployment of integrated engagement strategies that forge deeper connections between our brands and target audiences! And after learning, it was time to practice all together as a team, on real-life case studies and with an exciting final simulation game! A big thank you to our trainers Alex Martin Vivek Salunke Esra Ezibay and to the whole marketing team, for prioritizing learning & making it so much fun!
